sentences.en: DEBUG detailed explanation of the command line parameters, including format and uses the details.
sentences.cn: 详细的DEBUG命令行参数解释, 包含格式及用途、细节等.

sentences.en: Debug your macros: insert breakpoints, play partially or loop your playback.
sentences.cn: 调试您的宏: 插入断点, 发挥部分或闭环您的播放.

sentences.en: Experience hardware debug device , such as multi - meter, oscillograph, etc.
sentences.cn: 有万用表 、 示波器等常用工具的使用经验.

sentences.en: Explains how Debug and Release are used, and introduces build configurations.
sentences.cn: 说明如何使用“调试”版本和“发布”版本, 并介绍生成配置.

sentences.en: Link - maintenance frames are used to manage and debug a link.
sentences.cn: 连结维持讯框被用在连结的管理与除错.

sentences.en: Once again, careful planning is the key; good planning simplifies program debug.
sentences.cn: 再重复一次, 精心的编程设计是关键, 优良的设计可简化程序的调试.

sentences.en: Programmers at our installation write and debug lengthy code.
sentences.cn: 我们站的程序员编写和调整长长的代码.

sentences.en: Return the defect boards to Debug to repair.
The production lines ground to a halt for hours while technicians tried to debug software.
sentences.cn: 生产线停工达数小时之久，在此期间技术人员试图纠除软件错误。

sentences.en: These operators are used mainly to debug assembly - language code.
sentences.cn: 这些运算符主要用于调试汇编语言代码.

sentences.en: This model provides a good debug method for development of embedded system.
sentences.cn: 该模型为嵌入式系统的应用程序开发提供了良好的调试手段.

sentences.en: This paper presents commands of DEBUG and its applications in system maintenance.
sentences.cn: 介绍了debug命令 的作用和它在系统维护中的几项应用.

sentences.en: Trace is normally defined in both Debug and Release versions.
sentences.cn: 跟踪通常同时定义在“调试”和“发布”版本中.

sentences.en: We'll use DEBUG to look at a floppy disk's Boot Record.
sentences.cn: 我们将使用DEBUG来看看软盘的引导记录.

sentences.en: You can debug a release build of an application.
sentences.cn: 您可以调试应用程序的发布版本.

words.tran_cn: 调试器；[计] 调试程序

phrases.tran_cn: [计]调试监测程序；翟监督程序

trans.tran_cn: 调试；除错，改正有毛病部分；[军] 除去窃听器
trans.tran_en: to remove secret listening equipment from a place
